dt: {bc}a piece (as of metal or plastic) used in reckoning or in games
{bc}a level surface (such as a table, shelf or display case) over which transactions are conducted or food is served or on which goods are displayed or work is conducted
{bc}in or through a broker's office rather than through a stock exchange
{bc}by {d_link|surreptitious|surreptitious} means {bc}in an illicit and private manner

et: Middle English {it}countour{/it}, from Anglo-French, from Medieval Latin {it}computatorium{/it} computing place, from Latin {it}computare{/it} {dx_ety}see {dxt|count:1||}{/dx_ety}
shortdef: a piece (as of metal or plastic) used in reckoning or in games
something of value in bargaining : asset
a level surface (such as a table, shelf or display case) over which transactions are conducted or food is served or on which goods are displayed or work is conducted

dt: {bc}a person or thing that counts something

dt.t: … I would just tell them I am a very fast {wi}counter{/wi}.

dt: {bc}a device or process for indicating a number or amount

dt.t: a {wi}counter{/wi} that records how many times a website is visited
As they entered the main door on Fifth Avenue, the guard clicked off two numbers on his people {wi}counter{/wi}.

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French {it}cuntur{/it}, from {it}cunter{/it} to count
shortdef: a person or thing that counts something; especially : a device or process for indicating a number or amount

dt.t: tried to {wi}counter{/wi} the trend toward depersonalization
We {wi}countered{/wi} that our warnings had been ignored.

dt: {bc}to meet attacks or arguments with defensive or retaliatory steps

et: Middle English {it}countren{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}cuntre{/it} against, opposite, from Latin {it}contra{/it}; akin to Latin {it}com-{/it} with, together {ma}{mat|co-|}{/ma}
shortdef: to act in opposition to : oppose
offset, nullify
to assert in answer

dt: {bc}to or toward a different or opposite direction, result, or effect

dt.t: values that run {wi}counter{/wi} to those of society

shortdef: in an opposite or wrong direction
to or toward a different or opposite direction, result, or effect

dt: {bc}the after portion of a boat from the waterline to the extreme outward swell or stern overhang
{bc}the act of making an attack while parrying one (as in boxing)
{bc}a stiffener to give permanent form to a boot or shoe upper around the heel
{bc}an area within the face of a letter wholly or partly enclosed by strokes
{bc}a football play in which the ballcarrier goes in a direction opposite to the movement of the play

shortdef: contrary, opposite
the after portion of a boat from the waterline to the extreme outward swell or stern overhang
the act of making an attack while parrying one (as in boxing); also : a blow thus given in boxing

dt: {bc}marked by or tending toward or in an opposite direction or effect
{bc}given to or marked by opposition, hostility, or antipathy
{bc}recalling or ordering back by a superseding contrary order {bc}{sx|countermanding||}

shortdef: marked by or tending toward or in an opposite direction or effect
given to or marked by opposition, hostility, or antipathy
situated or lying opposite
contrary : opposite
opposing : retaliatory
complementary : corresponding

dt: {bc}a check obtainable at a bank usually to be cashed only at the bank by the drawer

shortdef: a check obtainable at a bank usually to be cashed only at the bank by the drawer

dt: {bc}opposing or offering an alternative to a {d_link|state|state:1}

dt.t: … a {wi}counter-state{/wi} movement that explicitly aims to destroy nation-state boundaries …

shortdef: opposing or offering an alternative to a state

dt: {bc}having, relating to, or being a system of restaurant service in which customers order food at a counter or register

dt.t: … has {wi}counter-style{/wi} ordering, so patrons order at the register and are given a number to display at their seats before the food arrives.

dt: {bc}having, relating to, or being a style of restaurant seating in which customers sit at a counter rather than at tables

shortdef: having, relating to, or being a system of restaurant service in which customers order food at a counter or register
having, relating to, or being a style of restaurant seating in which customers sit at a counter rather than at tables
